summary: This is a court filing from the US v. Maxwell case (20 Cr. 330) where the Assistant United States Attorney submits proposed redactions for several motions and responses, including a motion to exclude, a motion to preclude expert testimony, and a sealing order.

connections.description: C Everdell sends an email to Nathan regarding proposed redactions in the Maxwell case.
Both are included as email recipients from the same law firm domain (lunflaw.com) in the Maxwell case correspondence.
C Everdell is involved in submitting proposed redactions for the US v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Submission of proposed redactions
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney submits proposed redactions referenced in letter motion at Dkt. No. 506 for the Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is a court filing from November 25, 2021, regarding proposed redactions in the US v. Maxwell case (20 Cr. 330).
Multiple legal professionals (C Everdell, Laura Menninger, Jeff Pagliuca, Bc Sternheim) are involved in correspondence about the redactions.
The filing references several motions including a motion to exclude, a motion to preclude expert testimony, and a sealing order.
The Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is submitting the proposed redactions.
